The photo was accompanied by a misleadin: claiming that the man died due to a mobile phone explosion while listening to music with a headset while the phone was charging.
A reverse image search on Yandex reveale: based news site in 2015, reporting on clashes between Sikh protesters and police in Punjab state.
The image was also shared on the Twitter: based news outlet focusing on Sikh news, highlighting the police brutality faced by Sikhs in India.
